name: Uranyl sulfate
desc: Uranyl sulfate (UO2SO4), a sulfate of uranium, is an odorless lemon-yellow sand-like solid in its pure crystalline form. It is prepared by dissolving UO3 in H2SO4.

images.alt: Ball-and-stick model of the uranyl cation

Other anions:
Uranyl chloride
Uranyl nitrate
Uranyl carbonate
